content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure consists of two main sections: a double-arch structure on the left and a tower structure on the right
- Total layers: The left section has 3 layers (red arches at bottom and top, yellow connecting piece), the right section has 4 layers (red arches, green block, yellow blocks, orange tower with roof)
- Colors used: Red, Yellow, Green, and Orange

Structure Breakdown:
Left Section:
- 4 red arch blocks arranged in 2 layers
- 1 yellow horizontal connector block

Right Section:
- 2 red arch blocks at the base
- 1 green rectangular block
- 2 yellow blocks forming an L-shape
- 1 orange cylindrical tower
- 1 orange triangular roof piece

Assembly Order:
{
Step1: Move block with index 1 (Bottom left red arch)
Step2: Move block with index 2 (Bottom right red arch)
Step3: Move block with index 1 (Top left red arch)
Step4: Move block with index 2 (Top right red arch)
Step5: Move block with index 10 (Yellow horizontal connector)
Step6: Move block with index 1 (Right section bottom left red arch)
Step7: Move block with index 2 (Right section bottom right red arch)
Step8: Move block with index 7 (Green rectangular block)
Step9: Move block with index 10 (Yellow horizontal block)
Step10: Move block with index 11 (Yellow vertical block)
Step11: Move block with index 12 (Orange cylindrical tower)
Step12: Move block with index 14 (Orange triangular roof)
}

The assembly order follows a bottom-to-top approach for both sections, ensuring stability during construction. Each piece is selected to match exactly as shown in the block dictionary without any rotation.
